Name: Crazy Rotate
About the game: This is a simple game to test players' hand speed and judgment. Players need to manipulate the square, Each side of a square has a different color When a colored ball falls in the air Players need to rotate the square, Make the color of the square edge consistent with that of the ball Otherwise, the game will fail Game operation Rotate Left=A Rotate Right=D Game features: 1. The game is easy to play! 2. Games are suitable for young and old!
